abstract: Mark Shafir, one of Lehman Brothers‘s two global co-heads of mergers and acquisitions, is departing the firm to join Citigroup as a top deal-maker there, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.
lead_paragraph: Mark Shafir, one of Lehman Brothers‘s two global co-heads of mergers and acquisitions, is departing the firm to join Citigroup as a top deal-maker there, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.

headline.main: Senior Lehman Deal-Maker to Join Citigroup
